definitions.text: an event that occurs at a critical time
examples: at such junctures he always had an impulse to leave
it was needed only on special occasions

definitions.text: a crisis situation or point in time when a critical decision must be made
examples: at that juncture he had no idea what to do
he must be made to realize that the company stands at a critical point

definitions.text: the shape or manner in which things come together and a connection is made
